pr_title: Implement Args builder for listObjects API

timeline.bodyText: startAfter is used in ListObjectsV2 and marker is used in ListObjectV1, but both serve same functionality. We can remove one argument.
timeline.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: Thanks, will change to start using startAfter in both places.
replies.author: anjalshireesh

timeline.bodyText: As we follow google-style, we could use like the way in the code.
timeline.author: balamurugana

timeline.bodyText: We need use delimiter from args.delimiter() if it is null and we can default to /
timeline.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: I had kept the code as is and just refactored to reduce duplication. However, your suggestion seems like an improvement over the existing code - so I will change the code accordingly.
replies.author: anjalshireesh

timeline.author: balamurugana

timeline.message:
Implement Args builder for listObjects API

Added the new args class `ListObjectsArgs` to be used with the
listObjects API. Example usage:

```
Iterable<Result<Item>> results = minioClient.listObjects(
  ListObjectsArgs.builder().
    bucket("my-bucketname").
    includeUserMetadata(true).
    startAfter("start-after-entry").
    prefix("my-obj").
    maxKeys(100).
    fetchOwner(true)
  );
```

Also refactored some of the existing code to reduce duplication of code:

- Extract common part of the result of both V1 and V2 API into
`ListBucketResult`, and made the two specific classes
(`ListBucketResultV1` and `ListBucketResultV2`) extend from it. The main
difference between the two is the naming of the continuation token
(`continuationToken` in V2 vs `marker` in V1). Since this is only a
naming difference, both results can be treated the same way by
abstracting out the methods related to these result fields.

- Similarly, most of the logic of the iterators for the response of V1
and V2 was also common. Extracted it out into a new abstract class
called `ObjectIterator`.

Few improvements in ListObjectsArgs

- `startAfter` is used in `ListObjectsV2` and `marker` is used in
  `ListObjectV1`, but both serve same functionality. So removed `marker`
  and started using `startAfter` in both places.
- Better syntax in javadoc comment for `MinioClient#listObjects`
- Use delimiter from args instead of hard coding to "/"
- Add documentation in API.md

Few improvements in ListObjectsArgs

- `startAfter` is used in `ListObjectsV2` and `marker` is used in
  `ListObjectV1`, but both serve same functionality. So removed `marker`
  and started using `startAfter` in both places.
- Better syntax in javadoc comment for `MinioClient#listObjects`
- Use delimiter from args instead of hard coding to "/"
- Add documentation in API.md
